jobDescription: Job title: Data Analyst Job Description: Data Analyst, Hamilton, NJ and unanticipated client sites across US. Must be willing to travel and relocate domestically. Design and develop Data Governance standards and Data Quality metrics. Data analysis, validation and mapping documents. Engagement with the business on gathering requirements.  Experience within the following areas required: Processing Mapping, UML Methodology, Rational Unified Process, MS Office MS Office, MS Visio, MS Project, MS  EXCEL, SQL Queries.  Education and Experience required: Reqs BS in Comp Sci or Business or related. Job Location:  Hamilton, NJ and unanticipated client sites across the US. Must be willing to travel and/or relocate domestically.
